description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the denial of service vulnerability associated with the Windows Network Driver Interface Specification (NDIS) CVE-2024-38048:

1. Download and apply the relevant KB updates from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2, apply KB5040442.
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2, apply KB5040442.
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2, apply KB5040431.
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2, apply KB5040427.
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2, apply KB5040448.

2. Restart your system after installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
This update addresses an out-of-bounds read vulnerability in NDIS that could allow denial of service attacks.
Ensure your system is running the appropriate build numbers: [10.0.22631.3880, 10.0.22621.3880, 10.0.19045.4651, 10.0.19044.4651]. 
For manual installation, download the update packages from the following links:
- [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
- [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
- [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)
- [KB5040448](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040448)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure the system is running one of the specified versions of Windows 10 or 11.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
